title: What were the Wimbledon results?
description: Carlos Alcaraz continued his Wimbledon title defence on Sunday with a fourth-round victory against Andrey Rublev, while Taylor Fritz and Cameron Norrie also advanced. excerpt: Jannik Sinner and Novak Djokovic reached the fourth round at Wimbledon on Saturday. View Saturday's results from the All England Club.

html:
Wimbledon

Alcaraz, Norrie set quarter-final clash

July 06, 2025

Ezra Shaw/Getty Images

Wimbledon main-draw action runs until 13 July. By ATP Staff

Carlos Alcaraz continued his Wimbledon title defence on Sunday with a fourth-round victory against Andrey Rublev, while Taylor Fritz and Cameron Norrie also advanced.

View Sunday's featured results from the All England Club below and click here to see all scores.

Centre Court
Anastasia Pavlyuchenkova def. Sonay Kartal (GBR) 7-6(3), 6-4
[1] Aryna Sabalenka def. [24] Elise Mertens (BEL) 6-4, 7-6(4)
[2] Carlos Alcaraz (ESP) def. Andrey Rublev 6-7(5), 6-3, 6-4, 6-4

No. 1 Court
[5] Taylor Fritz (USA) def. Jordan Thompson (AUS) 6-1, 3-0 ret.
Cameron Norrie (GBR) def. [Q] Nicolas Jarry (CHI) 6-3, 7-6(4), 6-7(7), 6-7(5), 6-3
[13] Amanda Anisimova (USA) def. [30] Linda Noskova (CZE) 6-2, 5-7, 6-4
